interact.label: Interact
interact.hint: The sound made when you interact with an object or dialog.

collide.label: Collide
collide.hint: The sound made when a token collides with a wall or other token.

cry.label: Pokemon Cry
cry.hint: The sound made by Pokémon summoned, or when they start their turn.

catch.label: Catch
catch.hint: The sound made by Pokéballs when thrown, opened, or used to try catching a Pokémon.

heal.label: Heal
heal.hint: The healing sound made in a Pokémon Center.

pc.label: PC
pc.hint: The sounds made by a PC.

exit.label: Exit
exit.hint: The sounds made when switching scenes via a door.

reaction-surprise.label: Reaction: Surprise
reaction-surprise.hint: The sounds made by a token when it is reacting in surprise.

damage.label: Damage
damage.hint: The sounds made an actor takes damage.

low-hp.label: Low HP Alarm
low-hp.hint: The sounds made when an actor takes damage while below 20% HP.

rock-smash.label: Field Move: Rock Smash
rock-smash.hint: The sounds made a token uses Rock Smash to destroy a breakable rock.

cut.label: Field Move: Cut
cut.hint: The sounds made a token uses Cut to destroy a breakable plant.

Trainer.label: Trainer
Trainer.hint: The trainer of this Pokémon. This is the trainer that will throw the Pokéball when the Pokémon is summoned.
Trainer.dropWarning: You can only drop a Trainer Actor here.

canUseRockSmash.label: Rock Smash
canUseRockSmash.hint: Whether a Pokémon that knows Rock Smash (or trainer that owns such a Pokémon) can use it to break rocks.

canUseCut.label: Cut
canUseCut.hint: Whether a Pokémon that knows Cut (or trainer that owns such a Pokémon) can use it to cut down trees.

canUseWhirlpool.label: Whirlpool
canUseWhirlpool.hint: Whether a Pokémon that knows Whirlpool (or trainer that owns such a Pokémon) can use it to cross whirlpools.

canUseStrength.label: Strength
canUseStrength.hint: Whether a Pokémon that knows Strength (or trainer that owns such a Pokémon) can use it to move boulders.

canUseRockClimb.label: Rock Climb
canUseRockClimb.hint: Whether a Pokémon that knows Rock Climb (or trainer that owns such a Pokémon) can use it to climb rocky walls.

canUseWaterfall.label: Waterfall
canUseWaterfall.hint: Whether a Pokémon that knows Waterfall (or trainer that owns such a Pokémon) can use it to climb waterfalls.

canUseHeadbutt.label: Headbutt
canUseHeadbutt.hint: Whether a Pokémon that knows Headbutt (or trainer that owns such a Pokémon) can use it to hit trees.

canUseSurf.label: Surf
canUseSurf.hint: Whether a Pokémon that knows Surf (or trainer that owns such a Pokémon) can use it to surf on water.

RockSmash.Title: Rock Smash
RockSmash.CannotUse: This rock appears to be breakable.
RockSmash.CanUse: This rock appears to be breakable. Would you like to use Rock Smash?

Cut.Title: Cut
Cut.CannotUse: This tree looks like it can be cut down.
Cut.CanUse: This tree looks like it can be cut down. Would you like to use Cut?

Whirlpool.Title: Whirlpool
Whirlpool.CannotUse: It's a huge swirl of water.
Whirlpool.CanUse: It's a huge swirl of water. Would you like to use Whirlpool?

Strength.Title: Strength
Strength.CannotUse: It's a big boulder, but a Pokémon may be able to push it aside.
Strength.CanUse: It's a big boulder, but a Pokémon may be able to push it aside. Would you like to use Strength?
Strength.Used: {name} used Strength! {name}'s Strength made it possible to move boulders around!

RockClimb.Title: Rock Climb
RockClimb.CanUse: The wall is very rocky... Would you like to use Rock Climb?

Waterfall.Title: Waterfall
Waterfall.CanUse: It's a large waterfall. Would you like to use Waterfall?

Headbutt.Title: Headbutt
Headbutt.CannotUse: A Pokémon could be in this tree.
Headbutt.CanUse: A Pokémon could be in this tree. Do you want to headbutt it?

Surf.Title: Surf
Surf.CannotUse: The water is a deep blue...
Surf.CanUse: The water is a deep blue... Would you like to surf on it?

PokemonCenter.Welcome1: Hello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
PokemonCenter.Welcome2: We restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
PokemonCenter.Question: Would you like to rest your Pokémon?
PokemonCenter.Take: OK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
PokemonCenter.Thank2: We've restored your Pokémon to full health.
PokemonCenter.Goodbye: We hope to see you again!

Pokeball.label: Pokéball
Pokeball.hint: The image used for this actor's Pokéball.
